name: AIR TRAFFIC CONSULTING
goal: Supporting States, institutions, air navigation service providers, airspace users, airports and NGOs on matters of technology development and application for transport, air transport, intermodality, sustainability, social effects through automation, and more at European level in a global context.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Single European Sky, SESAR, EASA, SESAR Deployment, Performance and Charging Regulation
